response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value for us, but its true worth to you surpasses $1,500,000. After careful consideration, I am extending a special offer to you to purchase this product at a price of $1,200,000. This is a significant discount compared to its intrinsic value, aiming to ensure both a fair transaction and a chance for you to benefit from its unparalleled quality. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing further details with you. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
